column1: Kata Robata////Since moving to Houston almost ten years ago Kata has been my favorite restaurant. Every time I get to go it's a treat! Chef Manabu Horiuchi is brilliant when it comes to mixing flavors and textures. His omakase which I've had the pleasure of enjoying twice
column2: is an incredibly special experience. More than just sushi - the hot dishes and everything else are done right as well! If you go with a friend who happens to love sashimi - the sashimi for two is actually a very good deal for top quality fish.
